unnormalised: Arre yaar, alom hijuńgea PAN card ABCDE1234F apeyạḱ Aadhaar number lekate 31/03 ạgul re. Ạuṛi hoyok ạ, bạṅkhan, apem ITR filing re taṅgiṅ hoyoḱa. Noṅka, apeyạḱ GSTIN 09AAAAA0000A1Z5 ạpil aher pheṛhao pore apey update keḍa? Tax somoy do soben reak baṛeḍęć!
normalised: Arre yaar, alom hijuk'a apoñak' P-A-N card A-B-C-D-E-one-two-three-four-F apoñak' Aadhaar number sahẽd teped hoyok' tama mit' hisap sabta martch ạgũn. Aṉḍet' ge hoyok'a, bang khan, am I-T-R bharti katec' re asubidha huyũk' tama. Okoykatec' ho, apoñak' G-S-T-I-N zero-nine-triple-A-A-A-zero-zero-zero-zero-A-one-Z-five nawa sanśodhan ũncũkatec' teped katec' tama? Tax samay mit' hisap mũ̃ṉḍũ dõba!
